page.title: 17HOUND PACKS IN BRADFIELD
page.content: THE PENNINE FOX HOUNDS_this is a foot pack similar to the fell packs of Lake District.The followers walk instead of riding on horse back.They hunt in this area once a fortnight during the season(October_March).Thereare fifteen couples of dogs with this pack. THE ECCLESFIELD BEAGLES_this pack hunts 4_5 times a year,hunting for hares in the district.Again the followers are on foot.There are twelve couples of hounds. BLOOD HOUNDS_a pack of blood hounds, based near Retford,Nottinghamshire, visit this area twice a year.They are a mounted pack.This is a trail hunt, the hounds follow the trail of a man. Only six couples are in this pack.
